flavorText: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

foreignData.flavorText: Er wünschte sich zwar Macht, aber nicht die Langlebigkeit, um sie auch missbrauchen zu können.
foreignData.name: Todeswunsch
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Karte außerhalb des Spiels, die du besitzt, zeige sie offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Du verlierst die Hälfte (aufgerundet) deiner Lebenspunkte. Entferne den Todeswunsch ganz aus dem Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Él deseó poder, pero no la longevidad para abusar de él.
foreignData.name: Deseo de muerte
foreignData.text: Elige una carta tuya que esté fuera del juego y ponla en tu mano. Pierde la mitad de tu vida, redondeada hacia arriba. Remueve del juego el Deseo de muerte.

foreignData.flavorText: Il souhaita la puissance, mais pas la longévité pour en abuser.
foreignData.name: Souhait mortel
foreignData.text: Choisissez une carte que vous possédez en dehors de la partie et mettez-la dans votre main. Vous perdez la moitié de vos points de vie (arrondissez au nombre supérieur). Retirez le Souhait mortel de la partie.

foreignData.flavorText: Desiderò il potere, ma non la longevità necessaria per abusarne.
foreignData.name: Desiderio di Morte
foreignData.text: Scegli una carta che possiedi e che non fa parte della partita e aggiungila alla tua mano. Perdi metà dei tuoi punti vita, arrotondata per eccesso. Rimuovi dal gioco il Desiderio di Morte.

foreignData.flavorText: Ele desejou poder, mas não a longevidade para aproveitá-lo.
foreignData.name: Desejo Mortal
foreignData.text: Escolha um card seu que esteja fora do jogo e coloque-o em sua mão. Você perde metade dos seus pontos de vida, arredondados para cima. Remova Desejo Mortal de jogo.

name: Death Wish
originalText: Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Remove Death Wish from the game.

rulings.text: Can’t acquire the Ante cards. They are considered still “in the game” as are cards in the library and the graveyard.
If you fail to find something, you still lose half your life, rounded up.
If you fail to find something, you still exile this.
Can’t acquire cards that are phased out.
In a sanctioned event, a card that’s “outside the game” is one that’s in your sideboard. In an unsanctioned event, you may choose any card from your collection.
You can’t acquire exiled cards because those cards are still in one of the game’s zones.

text: You may put a card you own from outside the game into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.
